name: Detailed Packet Analysis with DataFrame
instruction: Utilize DataFrames for in-depth analysis of packet data, focusing on structure and content.

name: Packet Timing Analysis
instruction: Evaluate the timing intervals of packet transmissions to identify delays and peak traffic periods.

name: Security Analysis of Network Packets
instruction: Examine packets for security threats, protocol breaches, and unauthorized access attempts.

name: Flow Analysis of Network Traffic
instruction: Analyze the flow patterns of packets to identify typical and atypical traffic behavior.

name: Time Series Analysis and Visualization of Packet Data
instruction: Conduct a time series analysis of packet data and visualize trends over time.

name: Statistical Analysis of Network Packets
instruction: Apply statistical methods to analyze packet data for pattern recognition and anomaly detection.

name: Packet Size Analysis for Bandwidth Utilization
instruction: Assess packet sizes to understand bandwidth usage and identify potential bottlenecks.

name: Analysis of Packet Loss Rate and Round-Trip Time (RTT)
instruction: Evaluate the frequency of packet loss and measure RTT to assess network reliability.

name: Anomaly Detection in Packet Transmission
instruction: Detect and analyze anomalies in packet transmission to identify potential network issues.

name: Quality of Service (QoS) Analysis in Packet Transmission
instruction: Assess packet data to ensure adherence to QoS standards and optimize network performance.
